title: Discharge - Decontrol-The Singles [2 Disc]

Discharge: Cal (vocals); Bones (guitar); Rainy (bass); Tezz (drums).
Recorded between 1980 & 1999.

A 39 track introduction to ALL of Discharge&#039;s early material,this is like a history textbook on punk.
UK compilation for the long-lived British hardcore band. including their first single, &#039;Realities Of War&#039;, &#039;Fight Back&#039;, &#039;Decontrol&#039;, &#039;Never Again&#039;, &#039;State Violence, State Control&#039;, &#039;The More I See&#039; (original & extended) & &#039;Ignorance&#039; (original & extended). All late 70s early 80s Discharge stuff was grade A kick Ass True Punk/Hardcore music. Decontrol has a collection of a lot of their best songs.

Enjoy! :)
